projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title: Product operations trainee
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Product operations trainee


Description: Facilitating user interviews and other market research

Overseeing quality assurance checks on new features

Analyzing data to help product management make better-informed decisions

Developing business processes to streamline product development

Skill sets:Cloud infrastructures like AWS, Azure or Google Cloud platforms,

DevOps and Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD), Internet of

Things (IoT), Adaptability and Future-Proofing, penetration testing.

Traits expectation: Innovative, Competitive, Highly Social.

Expected learning: conducting user research, defining user personas and

scenarios, writing user stories and acceptance criteria, creating wireframes and

prototypes, prioritizing and managing the backlog, collaborating with engineers

and designers

Specific courses required for project execution: Internet of things (IoT), Digital

Image Processing, Business Communication, Print and Audio-Visual

Advertisement
